comment.author: 8783399@N04
comment._content: Considering the size of the team and what medals they brought home, I'd guess that the 1932 Olympic team was our most successful per head.

comment.realname: State Library of New South Wales
comment.author: 29454428@N08
comment._content: Yes HoldenV8 - in those days competitiors paid their way. Only a few could afford to go in the "amateur" days before huge government and commercial sponsorship, so you would only go if you had a good chance
